scripts.clean: rm -rf typings node_modules yarn.lock dist dist-site
scripts.build-site: VSITE=$(date +'%s') && rm -rf dist-site && mkdir -p dist-site/local_packages/aurelia-highlightjs@${VSITE} && cp -pr site/* dist-site/ && cp -pr dist dist-site/local_packages/aurelia-highlightjs@${VSITE}/ && mv dist-site/local_packages/aurelia-highlightjs@current.json dist-site/local_packages/aurelia-highlightjs@${VSITE}.json && cp -p package.json dist-site/local_packages/aurelia-highlightjs@${VSITE}/ && sed "s/current/${VSITE}/g" site/jspm.config.js > dist-site/jspm.config.js
scripts.build-and-update-site: ./node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc && cp -p src/hljs.html dist/ && VSITE=$(date +'%s') && cp -pr site/* dist-site/ && rm -rf dist-site/local_packages/aurelia-highlightjs@* && mkdir -p dist-site/local_packages/aurelia-highlightjs@${VSITE} && cp -pr dist dist-site/local_packages/aurelia-highlightjs@${VSITE}/ && cp -p site/local_packages/aurelia-highlightjs@current.json dist-site/local_packages/aurelia-highlightjs@${VSITE}.json && cp -p package.json dist-site/local_packages/aurelia-highlightjs@${VSITE}/ && sed "s/current/${VSITE}/g" site/jspm.config.js > dist-site/jspm.config.js
